articles.title: Italy captain Chiellini to retire from the national team
articles.description: ROME (AP) — Italy captain Giorgio Chiellini plans to retire from the national team after the “Finalissima” match against Argentina in London on June 1...
articles.content:
ROME (AP) — Italy captain Giorgio Chiellini plans to retire from the national team after the “Finalissima” match against Argentina in London on June 1.

articles.title: Thousands of farmers stage anti-tax protest in Argentine capital
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, April 23 (Reuters) - Thousands of Argentine farmers protested in Buenos Aires on Saturday against President Alberto Fernandez, whose policies to contain food prices to curb rampant inflation have been criticized by the agricultural sector.Argentina is one of the world's top food exporters and the sector is key to Latin America's third-largest economy.Protesters

articles.title: Russia's standing in G-20 not threatened by Ukraine invasion
articles.description: President Joe Biden has called for Russia to be kicked out of the group, but the U.S. has not said whether Biden would boycott the gathering if Russia participates.The G-20 members are Argentina, Australia, Brazil, Britain, Canada, China, France, Germany, India, Indonesia, Italy, Japan, Mexico, Russia, Saudi Arabia, South Africa, South Korea, Turkey, the U.S. and the EU.
articles.content: The last time Russia invaded Ukraine, in 2014, outraged world leaders booted Russia out of the Group of Eight industrialised nations, which quickly rebranded itself the Group of Seven. Eight years later, the G-7 is still holding at seven — a collecti... [6105 chars]
